column5: PARIS  Jan 12 Orange Chief Executive Stephane Richard said on Tuesday that a merger with rival French telecoms operator Bouygues would have to create value for the company and safeguard jobs in the sector.

column4: Brazilian mask company honors police hero with carnival mask
column5: RIO DE JANEIRO - A mask of a federal police agent known as "The Japanese Federal " who helped to detain politicians and executives in a corruption scandal engulfing state-run oil company Petrobras  could become a popular hit at Brazil's carnival. | Video

column4: UPDATE 6-Petrobras cuts spending again as oil-price drop bites
column5: RIO DE JANEIRO/SAO PAULO Jan 12 Petróleo Brasileiro SA  Brazil's state-controlled oil producer  on Tuesday slashed its investment budget for the third time in just over six months  to preserve cash to pay debt  the industry's largest.

column4: Petrobras cuts spending plan again as oil-price drop bites
column5: RIO DE JANEIRO/SAO PAULO Petróleo Brasileiro SA   Brazil's state-controlled oil producer  on Tuesday slashed its investment plan for the third time in just over six months as it tries to preserve cash to pay its debt  the industry's largest.

column4: Petrobras cuts five-year investment plan by 25 pct to $98.4 bln
column5: SAO PAULO  Jan 12 Petróleo Brasileiro SA   Brazil's state-controlled oil producer  has cut planned investments by 25 percent for the 2015-2019 period to $98.4 billion  the lowest in years  to account for a weaker currency and declining cash generation.

column4: Petrobras cleared to raise refinery output without controls
column5: RIO DE JANEIRO Brazil's Petrobras received a license on Monday  allowing it to boost crude processing by 35 percent at its controversial RNEST refinery  the local government said  a move that lets the company delay installation of promised pollution controls.

column4: Pfizer  Allergan say combined drug pipeline 'underappreciated'
column5: NEW YORK The research chiefs of betrothed drugmakers Pfizer Inc  and Allergan  say the proposed combination of their experimental drugs deserves more credit  including potential blockbuster treatments for schizophrenia and depression.

column4: Pfizer  Allergan say combined drug pipeline 'underappreciated'

column4: Plains All American raises $1.5 billion from private equity firms  calms investors
column5: NEW YORK Plains All American Pipeline LP said on Tuesday it has secured $1.5 billion in new financing from private equity firms  aimed at easing investor fears that the U.S. midstream company would cut shareholder payouts amid slumping crude oil prices.

column4: Plains All American raises $1.5 bln from private equity firms  calms investors
column5: NEW YORK  Jan 12 Plains All American Pipeline LP  said on Tuesday it has secured $1.5 billion in new financing from private equity firms  aimed at easing investor fears that the U.S. midstream company would cut shareholder payouts amid slumping crude oil prices.

column4: Renewals and 'cloud' sales boost SAP  but outlook cautious
column5: FRANKFURT SAP  Europe's largest software company  on Tuesday met or slightly beat its 2015 revenue and profit targets  driven by strong year-end software license renewals and customers moving to newer Internet-based software.

column4: UPDATE 2-Renewals and 'cloud' sales boost SAP  but outlook cautious
column5: * Shares rise 3.4 percent   (Adds details on margin  shares  trader and analyst comment)

column4: SAP 4th-qtr operating profit rises 7 pct on license renewals
column5: FRANKFURT  Jan 12 Europe's largest software company  SAP on Tuesday reported a 7 percent rise in operating profits  driven both by year-end software license renewals and customers converting to newer cloud-based software.

column4: Fitch Rates Simon Property Group's Notes Offering 'A'
column5: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  January 12 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned an 'A' rating to $1.35  billion of senior unsecured notes issued by Simon Property Group  L.P  the  operating partnership of Simon Property Group  Inc.  The offering totalled $550 million of 2.5% senior unsecured due July 15  2021  and $800 million of 3.3% senior unsecured notes due Jan. 15  2026. The company  expects to use the net proceeds to retire three existing mortgage loans

column4: Icahn says he does not have any position in Time Warner
column5: Billionaire activist investor Carl Icahn said on Tuesday he did own any stake in media company Time Warner Inc.

column5: Jan 12 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2100 GMT on Tuesday:

column4: Bewkes against HBO spinoff  open to Time Warner sale: NY Post
column5: Time Warner Inc  Chief Executive Jeff Bewkes is against a sale or a spinoff of premium cable channel HBO  but hinted he would be open to a sale of the whole company  the New York Post reported  citing sources.

column5: Jan 12 Time Warner Inc Chief Executive Jeff Bewkes is against a sale or a spinoff of premium cable channel HBO  but hinted he would be open to a sale of the whole company  the New York Post reported  citing sources.

column4: Icahn buying up Time Warner shares: sources
column5: Billionaire activist investor Carl Icahn is building an equity stake in Time Warner Inc   people familiar with the matter said on Monday.

column4: CORRECTED-UPDATE 2-Icahn buying up Time Warner shares - sources
column5: Jan 11 Billionaire activist investor Carl Icahn is building an equity stake in Time Warner Inc  people familiar with the matter said on Monday.

column4: Icahn buying up Time Warner shares - sources
column5: Jan 11 Billionaire activist investor Carl Icahn is building an equity stake in Time Warner Inc  people familiar with the matter said on Monday  in a move that could lead to a major shake-up of the media conglomerate.

column4: Toyota's kid brother Scion grows up as millennials delay buying cars
column5: DETROIT Scion  Toyota Motor Co's  youth-oriented brand  is targeting an older  more mainstream audience as "millennials" delay car purchases  raising the possibility of weaker-than-expected sales growth this year.

column4: Asian auto makers export more SUVs to U.S. in bid to meet demand
column5: DETROIT Asian automakers are scrambling to ship more sport utility vehicles to the United States to meet strong demand  tapping manufacturing capacity in Japan and South Korea.

column5: DETROIT Toyota Motor Corp is sprucing up its premium Lexus line with a facelift of its flagship sports coupe for 2017  as the world's largest automaker tries to shake off its reputation for boring designs.

column4: Murdoch  Hall engagement sparks mockery on social media
column5: The news of Rupert Murdoch's engagement to Jerry Hall sent social media into a sometimes snarky whirl on Tuesday  as Twitter users mocked the former supermodel for her plans to marry the elderly media mogul.

column5: Walt Disney Co's theme park in Shanghai is slated to open on June 16  the company said on Tuesday.

column4: Western Union transfers from Egypt to China curbed amid dollar shortage -sources
column5: CAIRO  Jan 12 Money transfers from Egypt to China via Western Union have been curbed in recent weeks to stop importers bypassing capital controls in place at Egyptian banks to manage a dollar shortage  banking and Western Union sources in Egypt said.

column4: Yum says China same-store sales rise 1 percent in December
column5: Yum Brands Inc   which is spinning off its China business  said December same-store sales increased 1 percent in the country  helped by a 5 percent rise at KFC.

column4: Yum Brands says China same-store sales rose slightly in December
column5: Jan 12 Yum Brands Inc estimated a 1 percent growth in December same-store sales in its China division  in its final monthly sales release before the business is spun off.

column4: Shareholder urges Ashford Hospitality Trust to repurchase stock
column5: Jan 11 An Ashford Hospitality Trust Inc  activist shareholder is agitating for changes at the lodging industry-focused real estate investment trust (REIT)  calling for a share buyback among its demands  according to a letter obtained by Reuters.
